name: proyecto-integracion
description: Plataforma de estudio colaborativo ColabLearn - Frontend y Backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend:coverage && npm run test:backend:coverage

author: ColabLearn Team
